ComicInfo.Summary:
Hayes and Aitken’s private war is suddenly interrupted, as the gentlemen of Germany’s Waffen SS take a hand. Captured and brutally interrogated, the future seems bleak for the two young Irishmen- but the battle about to begin will eclipse their fears and feuds completely. A stand is taken against the greater enemy, in the third and final part of Our Wild Geese Go. Available with Regular & Wraparound Covers by Tomas Aria, and Good Girl Nose Art & Battle Damage Retailer Incentive Covers by Matt Martin.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tomas Aira | 1 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Tomas Aira | 2 | GGNA | Good Girl Nose Art Cover | Matt Martin | 3 | RI | 1:3 Battle Damage Retailer Incentive Cover | Matt Martin | 4 |

ComicInfo.Title: Our Wild Geese Go, Part 3: One By One We're All Becoming Shades
